name: Hong Kong 2020 (Byeolkuk)
description:
This game was produced in early 2020 and was submitted to the game jam held in the game production community where I was active.
Until now, it has been closed to the outside of the community, but I will revise some of the contents and make it public now.
It is an unofficial sequel to Hong Kong 97, based on COVID-19, and Xi Jinping appears instead of Deng Xiaoping.
Blast the grim atmosphere of COVID-19 into this game.

Story subtitles are only displayed in Korean.
